HOW TO DOWNLOAD INSTAGRAM PROFILE , VIDEO , STORY ?

Find ways to copy links from various platforms below.

The goal is to open the post you need to download and copy the URL. You can do it from the mobile app or in a browser. If you open the Instagram app, click on the three dots and choose the menu item Copy Link.

Insert the link to the INSTA Downloader

Simply paste the link into the box of the tool you have chosen to save the content from. Click download and choose the folder on your device to save the content to.

The content is to download
